tasks.label: build-radar
tasks.command: cd radarworker && cmake --preset Ninja-Release-x64 && cd build/Ninja-Release-x64 && ninja

tasks.label: build-debug-radar

tasks.command: cd discord && cmake --preset Ninja-Debug-x64 && ninja -C build/Ninja-Debug-x64
